org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc

Class LircCodeLircDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc.LircHardware

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ILircCode

    public class LircCodeLircDevice
extends LircDevice
implements ILircCode
    This class models a "LircCode" Lirc hardware on /dev/lirc*.
